name: h3
description: Experience the cutting-edge performance of the 2025 Warstic Bonesaber Drop 5 USSSA Baseball Bat, designed for players seeking a balanced swing and superior control. This one-piece composite bat features a Katana2X Alloy Barrel with a 2 5/8 inch diameter, maximizing the sweet spot and enhancing whip through the zone for powerful hits. The natural wood colorway, paired with a Pommel Precision Knob, offers a pro-style feel that enhances comfort and control during play. With its Tsuka Pro-Tact Grip and Featherlite Aerophite Cap, this bat ensures increased tackiness, cushioning, and swing speed, making it a top choice for serious athletes. Certified by USSSA, the Bonesaber is engineered for excellence on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 273 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
